Name: Tank Ball
About the game: This is a game full of shooting and randomly generated . In this game, you control a tank to fight, 3D, third-person camera control. Find a way to defeat all enemies in each level, then collect coins to enhance yourself to deal with increasingly difficult mazes and enemies! Infinite procedural generate randomly mazes and enemies make the gameplay unpredictable. Tank abilities can be improved through the talent tree. Enemies have different AI. When they are placed in different levels, it is also very interesting to observe the laws of the enemy's movement. Unique sci-fi lights and scenes, full of sci-fi style. Features: Infinite random levels, randomly generated mazes and randomly generated enemies will become more and more powerful when you keep playing game, the mazes will become more and more complex, and the challenges will become more and more bigger Random big light beads, randomly generated enemies will have different colors and diverse AI Sci-fi style with colorful enemies Infinite collection and infinite technology tree enhancement
